title: Log In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the app
AND the user is on the Settings page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Log In
AND enters valid subscriber login details on the Log In page
custom_expected:
THEN the subscriber is successfully logged in
AND a loading screen is displayed with a spinning baseball image
AND the subscriber is navigated to the Settings page

title: Log Out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is logged into the app
AND the subscriber is on the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN the subscriber selects Log Out
custom_expected:
THEN the subscriber is successfully logged out of their account
AND the subscriber stays on the Settings page
AND "Log In" is displayed in the header
AND "Get MLB.tv" is displayed in the header

title: Turn Closed Captions ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Closed Captions are turned "Off" on the Settings page
AND the user is entitled to video playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user sets Closed Captions to "On" on the Setting page
AND selects a video for playback
custom_expected:
THEN Closed Captioning displays during video playback
AND the [CC] button in the scrubber displays "CC TURN OFF" when focused

title: Turn Closed Captions OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Closed Captions are turned "On" on the Settings page
AND the user is entitled to video playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user sets Closed Captions to "Off" on the Setting page
AND selects a video for playback
custom_expected:
THEN Closed Captioning does not display during video playback
AND the [CC] button in the scrubber displays "CC TURN ON" when focused

title: Comcast - Device Closed Captions ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Close Captions is set to ON in the settings of the Comcast device
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app on a Comcast device
AND the user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Settings page
custom_expected:
THEN Closed Captions on the Settings page is set to ON
AND Closed Captions display when playing back video content

title: Comcast - Device Closed Captions OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Close Captions is set to OFF in the settings of the Comcast device
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app on a Comcast device
AND the user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Settings page
custom_expected:
THEN Closed Captions on the Settings page is set to OFF
AND Closed Captions do not display when playing back video content

title: Favorite Team - Text
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN focus is assigned to "Favorite Team"
custom_expected: THEN "Select your favorite team. Chosen teams will always appear first on the Homepage" displays on the left side of the screen, below the header (config driven)

title: Favorite Team - UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN the MLB app has been launched
custom_steps: WHEN the Favorite Team page is displayed
custom_expected:
THEN the left third of the screen contains text, buttons, and the MLB Logo
AND "Select your favorite team here" is displayed as the title text (config driven)
AND "Help personalize your experience by selecting the team you go to bat for." is the text that displays below the title text (config driven)
AND two buttons display below the text
AND the left button is labeled "Cancel" or "Skip"
AND the right button is labeled "Done" or "Next"
AND the MLB logo is top left aligned
AND the right two-thirds of the screen contains 3 columns of 10 scrollable tiles
AND the tile backgrounds are dark grey
AND all 30 teams are displayed in alphabetical order
AND each team logo and team name is displayed in its own tile
AND with focus on a tile in the top three rows, 3 rows of 3 tiles are displayed with a 4th row peaking from the bottom of the screen
AND as the user navigates down through the teams, all 3 columns scroll up
AND with focus on any tile in rows 4 through 8, 3 rows of 3 tiles are displayed with rows peaking from the top of the screen and bottom of the screen
AND once the user navigates to the last row, 2 rows of 3 tiles are displayed with a 3rd row peaking from the top of the screen

**NOTE:**
"Cancel" and "Done" will display in the buttons if the Favorite Team page is loaded from the Settings page. 
"Skip" and "Next" will display in the buttons if the Favorite Team page is loaded as part of the onboarding flow.

title: Favorite Team - Navigation/Focus
custom_preconds: GIVEN the MLB app is launched
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Favorite Team page
AND the user presses the up/down/left/right directional buttons on the controller
OR the users moves the left analog stick up/down/left/right
custom_expected:
THEN focus is indicated with a white border around the team tiles
OR focus is indicated with a white background with black text for buttons
AND focus should be assigned to the user's favorite team, on page load
OR if the user does not have a favorite team set, focus is assigned to the top left most team tile (Arizona Diamondbacks), on page load
AND focus moves in relation to the user's input on the controller
AND focus does not leave the first row if the user attempts to navigate up, beyond the first row
AND focus does not leave the right column if the user attempts to navigate right, beyond the right column
AND focus does not leave the last row if the user attempts to navigate down, beyond the last row
AND focus moves to the "Done"/"Next" button if the user navigates left from any tile in the left column
AND focus moves to the previously focused tile if the user navigates right from the "Done"/"Next" button
AND focus moves to the "Cancel"/"Skip" button if the user navigates left from the "Done"/"Next" button 
AND focus moves to the "Done"/"Next" button if the user navigates right from the "Cancel"/"Skip" button
AND focus does not move from the "Cancel"/"Skip" button if the user attempts to navigate further to the left
AND focus does not move from the "Cancel"/"Skip" button if the user attempts to navigate up or down
AND focus does not move from the "Done"/"Next" button if the user attempts to navigate up or down

**NOTE:** 
"Cancel" and "Done" will display in the buttons if the Favorite Team page is loaded from the Settings page. 
"Skip" and "Next" will display in the buttons if the Favorite Team page is loaded as part of the onboarding flow.

title: Favorite Team - Selection UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Favorite Team page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a team tile
custom_expected:
THEN the team logo and team name are present in the tile
AND the tile background is updated to the team's primary color
AND a gold start is displayed in the upper right corner of the team tile

title: Favorite Team - Settings page Done
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a logged in user is on the Settings page
AND the user selects "Favorite Team" in the list of settings
AND the user selects a favorite team
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Done" button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated back to the Settings page
AND focus is assigned to "Log Out" in the list of settings
*** (NOT IMPLEMENTED) AND the user's newly selected favorite team displays in the header, to the left of "Settings" ***
AND the user's newly selected favorite team displays in the first game tile of the top row on the Games page, on day's the favorite team is playing
AND the user's newly selected favorite team displays in the first game tile of the Games carousel, or Hero/Featured spot, on the Home page, on days the favorite team is playing

title: Favorite Team - Settings page Cancel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a logged in user is on the Settings page
AND the user selects "Favorite Team" in the list of settings
AND the user selects a favorite team
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Cancel" button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated back to the Settings page
AND focus is assigned to "Log Out" in the list of settings
*** (NOT IMPLEMENTED) AND the user's previously selected favorite team displays in the header, to the left of "Settings" ***
AND the user's previously selected favorite team displays in the first game tile of the top row on the Games page, on day's the favorite team is playing
AND the user's previously selected favorite team displays in the first game tile of the Games carousel, or Hero/Featured spot, on the Home page, on days the favorite team is playing
IF a favorite team was not previously selected, the Games page and Games carousel will display in the order of game start time
OR if a favorite team was not previously selected, the Games page and Games carousel will first display any Following Teams the user may have selected

title: Favorite Team - Settings page Back
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a logged in user is on the Settings page
AND the user selects "Favorite Team" in the list of settings
AND the user selects a favorite team
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the BACK button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated back to the Settings page
AND focus is assigned to "Log Out" in the list of settings
*** (NOT IMPLEMENTED) AND the user's previously selected favorite team displays in the header, to the left of "Settings" ***
AND no updates were saved to the user's favorite team

title: Favorite Team - Change
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an existing subscriber is logged in
AND has already selected a favorite team
AND navigates to the Favorite Team screen
custom_steps: WHEN a new favorite team is selected
custom_expected:
THEN the previously selected favorite team is no longer selected
AND the new favorite team tile background changes to the team's primary color
AND a star has been added to the upper right corner of the new favorite team tile
AND the user's newly selected favorite team displays in the first game tile of the top row on the Games page, on day's the favorite team is playing
AND the user's newly selected favorite team displays in the first game tile of the Games carousel, or Hero/Featured spot, on the Home page, on days the favorite team is playing
AND the <favorite_team> Most Popular carousel is updated appropriately

title: Favorite Team - Cannot De-selected
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Favorite Team page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the selected the favorite team
custom_expected:
THEN the team tile stays selected
AND the user cannot have zero favorite team tiles selected once a favorite team has been selected

title: Following Teams - Text
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN focus is assigned to "Following Teams"
custom_expected: THEN "Select your teams you wish to follow. Chosen teams will always appear after the favorite team on the Homepage." displays on the left side of the screen, below the header (config driven)

title: Following Teams - UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN the MLB app has been launched
custom_steps: WHEN the Following Teams page is displayed
custom_expected:
THEN the left third of the screen contains text, buttons, and the MLB Logo
AND "Select additional teams to follow" is displayed as the title text (config driven)
AND "Add more teams to your clubhouse and help build your home screen on MLBTV." is the text that displays below the title text (config driven)
AND two buttons display below the text
AND the left button is labeled "Cancel" or "Skip"
AND the right button is labeled "Done" or "Next"
AND the MLB logo is top left aligned
AND the right two-thirds of the screen contains 3 columns of 10 scrollable tiles
AND the tile backgrounds are dark grey
AND all 30 teams are displayed in alphabetical order
AND each team logo and team name is displayed in its own tile
AND with focus on a tile in the top three rows, 3 rows of 3 tiles are displayed with a 4th row peaking from the bottom of the screen
AND as the user navigates down through the teams, all 3 columns scroll up
AND with focus on any tile in rows 4 through 8, 3 rows of 3 tiles are displayed with rows peaking from the top of the screen and bottom of the screen
AND once the user navigates to the 9th row, 3 rows of 3 tiles are displayed with a 4th row peaking from the top of the screen
AND once the user navigates to the 10th row, 2 rows of 3 tiles are displayed with a 3rd row peaking from the top of the screen

**NOTE:**
"Cancel" and "Done" will display in the buttons if the Following Teams page is loaded from the Settings page. 
"Skip" and "Next" will display in the buttons if the Following Teams page is loaded as part of the onboarding flow.

title: Following Teams - Navigation/Focus
custom_preconds: GIVEN the MLB app is launched
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Following Teams page
AND the user presses the up/down/left/right directional buttons on the controller
OR the users moves the left analog stick up/down/left/right
custom_expected:
THEN focus is indicated with a white border around the team tiles
OR focus is indicated with a white background with black text for buttons
AND focus is assigned to the top left most team tile (Arizona Diamondbacks), on page load
AND focus moves in relation to the user's input on the controller
AND focus does not leave the first row if the user attempts to navigate up, beyond the first row
AND focus does not leave the right column if the user attempts to navigate right, beyond the right column
AND focus does not leave the last row if the user attempts to navigate down, beyond the last row
AND focus moves to the "Done"/"Next" button if the user navigates left from any tile in the left column
AND focus moves to the previously focused tile if the user navigates right from the "Done"/"Next" button
AND focus moves to the "Cancel"/"Skip" button if the user navigates left from the "Done"/"Next" button 
AND focus moves to the "Done"/"Next" button if the user navigates right from the "Cancel"/"Skip" button
AND focus does not move from the "Cancel"/"Skip" button if the user attempts to navigate further to the right
AND focus does not move from the "Cancel"/"Skip" button if the user attempts to navigate up or down
AND focus does not move from the "Done"/"Next" button if the user attempts to navigate up or down

**NOTE:** 
"Cancel" and "Done" will display in the buttons if the Following Teams page is loaded from the Settings page. 
"Skip" and "Next" will display in the buttons if the Following Teams page is loaded as part of the onboarding flow.

title: Following Teams - Selection UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Following Teams page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a team tile
custom_expected:
THEN the team logo and team name are present in the tile
AND the tile background is updated to the team's primary color

title: Following Teams - Settings page Done
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a logged in user is on the Settings page
AND the user selects "Following Teams" in the list of settings
AND the user selects a team tile
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Done" button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated back to the Settings page
AND focus is assigned to "Log Out" in the list of settings
AND the user's newly selected following team displays with secondary priority to a user's favorite team in the top row on the Games page, on day's the followed team is playing
AND the user's newly selected following team displays with secondary priority to a user's favorite team in the Games carousel, or Hero/Featured spot, on the Home page, on days the followed team is playing

title: Following Teams - Settings page Cancel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a logged in user is on the Settings page
AND the user selects "Following Teams" in the list of settings
AND the user selects a following team
OR the user does not select a following team
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Cancel" button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated back to the Settings page
AND focus is assigned to "Log Out" in the list of settings
AND the user's previously saved following team/s are shown on the Following Teams page
AND the user's previously saved following team/s displays with secondary priority to the user's favorite team in the top row on the Games page, on day's the followed team is playing
AND the user's previously saved following team/s displays with secondary priority to the user's favorite team in the Games carousel, or Hero/Featured spot, on the Home page, on days the followed team is playing
IF a favorite team was not previously selected, the Games page, Games carousel, and Hero/Featured spot will first display any Following Teams the user may have selected
IF no favorite or following team is selected, games will display in order of game time

title: Following Teams - Settings page Back
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a logged in user is on the Settings page
AND the user selects "Following Teams" in the list of settings
AND the user selects a following team
OR the user does not selecta a following team
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the CIRCLE/O button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated back to the Settings page
AND focus is assigned to "Log Out" in the list of settings
AND no updates were saved to the user's following teams

title: Following Teams - Selecting Multiple Teams
custom_preconds: GIVEN the logged in user is on the Following Teams page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects multiple team tiles
custom_expected:
THEN each selected team tile background is the associated team primary color
AND the user is navigated back to the Settings page after selecting the "Done" button
AND the user's newly selected following teams display with secondary priority to a user's favorite team in the top row on the Games page, on day's the followed teams are playing
AND the user's newly selected following teams display with secondary priority to a user's favorite team in the Games carousel, or Hero/Featured spot, on the Home page, on days the followed teams are playing

title: Hide Spoilers UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Settings page
AND focus is assigned to "Hide Spoilers"
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the ENTER/SELECT button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the Hide Spoilers value is toggled between Off/On
AND the following text displays on the left side of the screen, "Scores can be hidden for live and archived games to avoid display of spoilers."

title: ***Currently N/A*** Autoplay Live Featured Content
custom_preconds: 1. User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Select Log In on the Top Nav
3. User should give the correct credentials and Login with the Monthly or Annual account.
4. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Settings option
5. User clicks on Autoplay Live Featured Game to toggle between ON and OFF.
custom_expected:
On the left side, user should see the text "Enable autoplay to automatically stream live games on the home page"

If the option is set to 'On', Enable autoplay on the homepage, then should follow the homepage autoplay rules. 

If the option is set to 'Off', user should be able to autoplay on the homepage, then user should see the game date + Static image of the featured Content.

title: ***Currently N/A*** Get MLB.TV
custom_preconds: 1. User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Select Log In on the Top Nav
3. User should give the correct credentials and Login with the Monthly or Annual account.
4. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Settings option
5. User selects "Upgrade MLB.TV" option
custom_expected:
On the left side, user should see the text 
"Upgrade your MLB.TV subscription to access more baseball."

When the "Upgrade MLB.TV" option is selected then user should navigate to " MLB Account and Buy MLB.TV package" purchase page.

title: ***Currently N/A*** Upgrade MLB.TV
custom_preconds:
1. User should Login with a valid account
2. Ensure that the account is not purchased from ROKU App. (Account:tvyearly19@gmail.com/Password1)
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Select Log In on the Top Nav
3. User should give the correct credentials and Login with the Monthly or Annual account.
4. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Settings option

WHEN the user did not purchase a monthly or Yearly subscription via Roku Pay.
custom_expected: THEN the user should not see the Upgrade Option in Settings.

title: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN "Terms of Service and Privacy Policy" has focus
custom_expected:
THEN the following text appears on the left side of the screen, 
"MLB’s Terms of Service and policies, including Privacy Policy, apply. 

Please visit mlb.com/tou for Terms of Service. 

Please visit mlb.com/privacy for Privacy Policy.

Please visit mlb.com/do-not-sell-or-share-my-personal-data to opt out of targeted advertising and tracking."

title: Contact Support
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN "Contact Support" has focus
custom_expected: THEN the following text appears on the left side of the screen, "Have questions? For in-game support, please visit us on the web at https://mlb.tv/support"

title: Jump to Top Nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Settings page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the bottom of the Games page
AND the user presses the [triangle] button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the [Setting] tab in the navigation header at the top of the screen gains focus
AND the page scrolls to the top
AND the user stays on the Settings page

title: Log Out
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN a user logs out of the application
custom_expected:
THEN the user is successfully logged out
AND the header contains the MLB logo and text left justified
AND "HOME", "Games" displays to the right of the MLB logo and text
AND "Log In", "Get MLB.tv", "Settings" is displayed right justified

title: Log In - Free user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a free MLB account
AND does not pay for a subscription
custom_steps: WHEN a free account user logs into the app
custom_expected:
THEN the user is successfully logged in
AND the header contains the MLB logo and text left justified
AND "Home" displays to the right of the MLB logo and text
AND "Games" displays to the right of "Home"
AND "Upgrade MLB.TV" and "Settings" is displayed right justified

title: Log In - Paid subscriber
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a paid MLB subscription
custom_steps: WHEN a paid subscriber logs into the app
custom_expected:
THEN the subscriber is successfully logged in
AND the header contains the MLB logo and text left justified
AND "Home" displays to the right of the MLB logo and text
AND "Games" displays to the right of "Home"
AND "Settings" is displayed right justified

title: Header Navigation - Settings page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has launched the app
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the the [Settings] button in the navigation header
custom_expected:
THEN the Settings page loads
AND focus leaves the 'Settings' button in the header
AND the 'Settings' text color changes from black to white
AND the 'Settings' text becomes bold
AND all other button text in the header is not bold
AND focus is assigned to the "Log in/Log Out" element on the page

title: Header Navigation - Settings tab focus
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Settings page
AND focus is not in the header
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to the header using the UP button
custom_expected:
THEN focus returns to the Settings tab in the header
AND the 'Settings' text color changes from white to black

title: Settings Page Navigation
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Settings page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates from the Settings button in the header down through all the items on the page
AND navigates back up to the Settings button in the header
custom_expected: THEN focus is assigned to each item on the page

title: Environment switching
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Settings page
AND the user has selected 'Dev Settings'
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects different Environment Settings
custom_expected:
THEN the app loads and functions as expected
AND the appropriate environment data is displayed

title: Samsung Only - User Sees Exit Confirmations screen when trying to exit the app
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the mlb app on Samsung tv
custom_steps:
WHEN the user triggers the exit key by pressing the exit button on the IR remote
OR the user triggers the exit key by pressing and holding the Return button on the Bluetooth remote
custom_expected: THEN the user is presented with the Exit Confirmations Screen

title: Samsung Only - User Exits from any non-Home page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the mlb app on Samsung tv
custom_steps:
WHEN the user triggers the exit key by pressing the exit button on the IR remote
OR the user triggers the exit key by pressing and holding the Return button on the Bluetooth remote
custom_expected: THEN the user should Exit the app from **ANY** non-home page

title: Samsung Only - User long presses Return on Bluetooth remote
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the mlb app on Samsung tv
AND the user is on a Detail page within the MLB app
custom_steps: WHEN the user long presses the Return button (on the bluetooth remote)
custom_expected: THEN then the user should trigger the Exit confirmation page

title: Samsung Only - Exit screen UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the mlb app on Samsung tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user triggers the exit key
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the MLB logo in the top left of the screen
AND the user should see a title which reads "Exit the App"
AND the user should see the text "Are you sure you want to leave MLBTV?"
AND the user should see a button option that read "Yes, Exit"
AND the user should see another button option the reads "No, Go Back"

title: Samsung Only - User confirms exit on Exit Confirmation screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the mlb app on Samsung tv
AND the user is on the Exit Confirmations Screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Yes, Exit" button
custom_expected: THEN the user successfully exits the app

title: Samsung Only - User selects "Cancel" on Exit Confirmation screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the mlb app on Samsung tv
AND the user is on the Exit Confirmations Screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Cancel" button
custom_expected: THEN the user is returned to the previously viewed screen.

title: Samsung Only - User Sees proper background image on Exit Confirmations screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the mlb app on Samsung tv
custom_steps:
WHEN the user triggers the exit key by pressing the exit button on the IR remote
OR the user triggers the exit key by pressing and holding the Return button on the Bluetooth remote
custom_expected:
THEN the Exit confirmation screen appears
AND the background image should be rendered from branding service

NOTE: this is the link from the branding service - https://img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-mobile/oms/branding/mlbtv/welcome/MLB-0-c3b6338e-c939-4788-9e46-67369048b2ab

title: Samsung Only - User exits from Home page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the MLB.tv app on a Samsung TV
AND the user is on the Home page
AND a feed select modal is not displayed (feeds/blackout/other messaging)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user short presses the "Return" key on a bluetooth remote control
OR the user short presses the "Return" key on an IR remote control
custom_expected: THEN the user should be presented with the Exit screen

title: LG Only - Back button prompts Exit
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Startup screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the BACK button on the remote control
custom_expected:
THEN an LG/webOS modal displays
AND the modal asks the user if they want to quit the app
AND pressing "Exit" in the modal closes the app
OR pressing "Cancel" in the modal dismisses the modal

title: PS5 Only - Long press PS button prompts Exit
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has launched the MLB.tv app on a PS5
custom_steps: WHEN the user long presses the "PS" button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the app is dismissed
AND the user lands on the Playstation Home screen
